scripts.build: yarn run build.static && yarn run build.typescript
scripts.build.static: copyfiles --up 1 public/**/*.* dist && copyfiles --up 1 lib/**/*.* dist && copyfiles --up 2 node_modules/requirejs/require.js dist && copyfiles --up 3 node_modules/jszip/dist/jszip.js dist && copyfiles --up 2 node_modules/nbt/nbt.js dist
